resources.string: You have the latest app version
We recommend installing a new app version:
Pressing the button will get your current location
You are using an outdated app version
You cannot continue until you install the new app version
Select what you want to sync:
To receive tasks, go to the Work Plan section. Open the menu (≡) in the top-left corner and select Work Plan.
Failed to retrieve data. Server is not responding. Check your internet connection and try again later.
Requested data not found. Please try again or contact your supervisor.

To upload photos to the website, please read the instructions!

 0. Allow the app to use location data.
 1. We recommend opening this app from the mobile version of the website.
 2. Tap the "Take photo" button below and take a photo.
 2.1. To take a photo, GPS must be enabled on your phone.
 2.2. If the camera does not open, try enabling GPS and restarting the app.
 3. Add a comment (optional).
 4. Tap "Upload to server".

 To take a series of photos, use the "Take another photo" button. Save the last photo in the series for sending by tapping "Save / Close".

 SAVING PHOTOS
 Photos are saved for uploading to the website when you tap "Take another photo" or "Save / Close".
 After the photo is saved, you can start uploading; otherwise, unsaved photos will not appear on the website.

 COORDINATES. Provider. GPS. NET. Location.
 To check whether the coordinates are up to date, open the "Traffic light" menu and look at the "Provider" indicator color.
 If it is green, fresh coordinates have been obtained and you can continue working.
 If it is yellow, there is an issue with GPS coordinates. This means your location may be determined inaccurately, which can cause location-related issues.
 To fix this, tap "Provider", then tap "GPS" (it should be red). If it turns green and you see a message that GPS data is up to date, you can continue.
 If the color does not change and you see a message that the data is outdated, you need to obtain fresh GPS data. Go outside or stand near a window and wait about a minute until the phone gets a new fix.
 If it is red or gray, the data could not be obtained. First try tapping "Go to Home" in the three-dot menu. If that does not help, go outside or stand near a window and wait about a minute until the phone gets a new fix.

Attention!
 This is a test version of the app. For testing, you do not have to be at the retail location. You may receive a bonus for working with it!

 To do this, follow the instructions below and leave feedback in MVS (on the testing day) in the "i" section, item №4.
 IMPORTANT: In your feedback, specify the Version number and Date!

 List of required actions to test:
The developer forgot to write the list.
